title: Custom Home Build
description: Bradley Brown can build or remodel your entire home that is one of a kind and custom to your liking or his design.

img.author: Photo by Bradley Brown Inc Custom White Gold Glass Shower

title: Gourmet Kitchen Renovation
description: Complete kitchen transformation featuring custom cabinetry, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a large center island. This modern gourmet kitchen combines functionality with elegant design.

img.author: Photo by Jarek Ceborski on Unsplash

title: Bachelor Master Makeover
description: Complete transformation of a bachelor's master bedroom suite featuring modern masculine design elements, custom built-in entertainment center, sleek bathroom with walk-in shower, smart home integration, and sophisticated color palette combining charcoal grays with warm wood accents. This project showcases the perfect blend of functionality and style for the modern bachelor lifestyle.

title: Outdoor Living & Entertainment Deck
description: Custom-built multi-level deck with built-in seating, pergola structure, outdoor kitchen space, and professional lighting. Perfect for entertaining and enjoying Mississippi's beautiful weather.

title: Historic Home Restoration
description: Careful restoration of a 1920s craftsman home preserving original architectural details while modernizing electrical, plumbing, and HVAC systems. Features restored hardwood floors, period-appropriate fixtures, and updated kitchen and bathrooms.

img.author: Photo by Corey Hughes Five Hughes LLC

title: Two-Story Home Addition
description: Expanded living space with a two-story addition including a new master bedroom suite upstairs and family room below. Seamlessly integrated with existing home architecture, featuring vaulted ceilings, large windows, and custom trim work.
